Employment is dependent upon satisfactory results of the investigation and polygraph.All Idaho State Police Forensic Laboratories are accredited by A2LA and to the ISO 17025:2005 Standard. State Police Forensic Laboratories serve state, local, and federal law enforcement agencies; state and county prosecutors; and public defenders.Learn more about a career of a lifetime with the Idaho State Police at https://www.isp.idaho.gov/ and how the State of Idaho can be your forever home at https://visitidaho.org/.
